managementResponses.response:
Dear Steven,

Thanks for staying with us and for your feedback. We just finished the window cleaning project. Sorry for any inconvenience.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: VERY noisy location.  Windows were extremely dirty
review.reviewText: Overpriced in my opinion.  The building needs renovation desperately.
review.negativeRemarks: I understand that the price per night is based on other factors, but this place needs some serious renovation and cleaning.
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco is small enough that next time I visit I will stay in another location further out of the center knowing I can easily get around.

managementResponses.response: Thanks for the kudos about our location. We will work on the other stuff.

review.title: Good location but noisy, mediocre
review.reviewText: Once you pay for the room, everything else is an extra charge.  Coffee and pastries in the lobby not only not complimentary but cost twice as much as elsewhere.  Key card system in elevator SUCKS and we took the stairs to avoid it.  Once we agreed to "Green Housekeeping" to not have our sheets changed, we had no housekeeping at all.  Beds never made, no toilet paper, tissues, towels or coffee packets.  We chased maids down in the hall to get toilet paper.   Free Wi-Fi in the lobby only.  Our room was facing an alley with a generator parked in it and we heard traffic from the main road all night long.  No fridge in room.  The location was central to Fisherman's Wharf (one block from waterfront) with Big Bus and Tower Tours right across the street and MUNI bus and streetcar stops very close.  For all that, it was a very busy place with people coming and going all day long.  The lobby was like Grand Central Station.

managementResponses.response:
Dear CK,

We are thrilled that you had a five star experience with us at Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf. Thanks for the nice comments about our location and all the things we were able to do from here.

It was our pleasure to serve you. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Great hotel, walking distance to all the fun.
review.reviewText: We had a really fun time in SF. Went to Napa, Alcatraz, went on a tour bus to Sausalito. Ate at many great restaurants. Rented mini yellow cars and traveled the city.

managementResponses.response:
Dear JJ,

Sorry for the mix up on your reservation. We will work hard to ensure that every Guest leaves satisfied.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: good location bad experience
review.reviewText: We reserved this hotel on Expedia and paid in advance.  We knew we were going to be late check in and called 3 times and asked them to save our room, each time they said it was saved.  We arrived at hotel 9:30pm and they gave our room away.  The front desk clerk was trying to give us a room for 2 people but our reservations was for 4. I told him we reserved a double and he said we reserved "A" room. He was a little rude  It took 45 minutes to find us a room to sleep 4 and get us checked in. When we arrived at the room it wasn't very clean and it was located next to the entrance/valet.  It was very loud.  This room was overpriced for the experience we received, when it could have been much better.  I would not stay at this hotel or a Sheraton again.  They need to learn customer appreciation.
review.negativeRemarks: Customer Service and commitment to reservations.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Barb,

We are happy to know that our staff took such good care of you and our location was excellent. Please be sure to look for the packages we offer as they may provide a bit more value.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: sherston Fisherman's Wharf
review.reviewText: Hotel was nice and well cared for. Staff was nice and helpful. Had to pay for wifi and it didn't work very well. Location was excellent. Bathroom was tiny. Noisy street outside the room. Breakfast was $24.95 per person. Hotel was very expensive!! Parking was $60/ day.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Allan,

We are sorry that the room selected was not to your likely. Where we are happy that our team made an appropriate gesture, we are unsure why a room better suited to your needs was rejected.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Terrible room location
review.reviewText: Opposite street generator, above exit for indoor garage.  Never was told at check in. Did not realize this until we tried to go to sleep. Noise prohibited sleep. On record with guest services at 3:30 am. Finally got to speak to hotel room manager after speaking to someone else he sent out. Offered free breakfast and to change room. Did not want to change room because we were only staying in San Francisco for one day and did not want to waste 2 hours packing, repacking, and unpacking again. Finally agreed to be comped for first night. Manager refused to comp us for second night only to change room. Again did not want to waste the time. Same problem next night, very unfair, hotel was expensive
review.positiveRemarks: Housekeeping very nice and efficient and good location

managementResponses.response:
Dear Jo,

We love you for posting this five star review of your experience at Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf. Thanks for the kudos about our location, clean and comfortable accommodations and very nice staff.

We will definitely look forward to your next trip here. Make it soon!

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Excellent location!
review.reviewText: Love this hotel! Excellent location to all activities and easy access to transportation . Hotel is clean , comfortable and staff is very nice !! We will come back .

managementResponses.response:
We were glad that "tourists like you" stayed with us at Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf. It is great to know that you had a nice time here. Thanks for the kudos about our clean, modern facilities. 

Please note that most SPG Guests now get free in room wifi. If you are not currently a member, now is a good time to join and start enjoying all the benefits.

We look forward to your next trip to San Francisco.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Nice hotel in the heart of tourist area
review.reviewText: Great location for tourists like us.  Really nice with clean. updated, modern rooms.  Only downsides were all the extra expenses.  Parking and charging for wi-fi in the room made this over-priced.  Lobby was very crowded as that had free wi-fi. there wasn't enough seating for everyone.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Pat,

Thanks for the nice review of your stay with us. Glad that our location and Spressi Lobby Cafe was convenient for your morning fuel up. Did you know that most SPG Guests now get free in room wifi? 

It was our pleasure to serve you. All of us at Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf look forward to seeing you again.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Good location
review.reviewText: Close to the wharf and cable car. Enjoyed hotel having snack bar for early morning coffee. Wifi in lobby but not in rooms.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Mackir,

Thanks for the feedback. We will share with our staff to ensure that we are more responsive.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Big and sterile
review.reviewText: Impossible to reach front desk and room service on the phone.

managementResponses.response:
Thanks for staying with us. Lets plan a little longer next time to enjoy San Francisco a bit more.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Great location.
review.reviewText: We were there only one night.  Checked in late and left early

managementResponses.response:
Dear Carlos,

Thanks for the feedback. All rooms should have a coffee maker with Starbucks coffee. Hope you let us know during your stay. 

Please check the rules for free in room internet for SPG Guests as there are certain requirements to qualify.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Good Location only that
review.reviewText: Worst Check in ever,  beds very small and uncomfortable, not even coffee maker in the room not even coffee in the lobby only at the small cafe.  Parking very expensive, WIFI not free and very expensive.
review.negativeRemarks: Free WIFI not even for SPG members the WIFI was free, Parking is very expensive is better to park in the parking next the hotel or in the street (Free
review.locationRemarks: Good Location, easy walk to fisherman wharf and little italy and Coit Tower

managementResponses.response:
Dear Eliseo,

We really appreciate the five star rating of your stay with us at Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf. It is great to know that our staff made such a memorable first impression.

It was our pleasure to serve you. We look forward to the next time you and the family can visit.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Wonderful family trip
review.reviewText: My family and I recently stayed at this hotel, first impression was what a wonderful hotel, excellent location, even at the check in front desk got us early check in. It's literally one block from the famous fisherman's wharf and it's attractions, 20 min walking distance to little Italy, and china town. Wonderful time.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Can,

We were delighted to see this five star rating and nice comments about your recent stay with us at Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf. Thanks for pointing out our clean and comfortable accommodations and cozy outdoor living rooms with the fire pits. Glad they provided a nice was to conclude the evenings.

It was our pleasure to serve you. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Perfect location. Walking distance to wharf
review.reviewText: Great time. Clean and comfortable. Love the fire pit seating area outside. Great to unwind at end of night.

managementResponses.response:
Thanks for the four star rating of your stay with us at Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf. We are happy to know that our location and well maintained facilities added to a pleasant experience here. We will see if we can track down the source of the odor you mentioned.

It was our pleasure to serve you. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Great location.
review.reviewText: Hotel was located close to restaurants, shopping and all Pier activities.  Close to cable car station, Ghirardelli Square.
review.positiveRemarks: Hotel was located close to restaurants, shopping and all Pier activities.  Close to cable car station, Ghirardelli Square
review.negativeRemarks: Carpeting in hallway smelled musty/humid, otherwise hotel seemed well maintained.
review.locationRemarks: Shopping, Restaurants and Pier 39, Cable cars nearby

managementResponses.response:
Dear Family,

We are happy that your stay was pleasant. The summertime brings a lot of families to San Francisco. We will work harder to make sure everyone gets the best experience ever.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Sheraton stay
review.reviewText: Our stay was generally pleasant but probably wouldn't stay again. The hotel lobby constantly looks like a backpackers hostel with noisy teenagers everywhere using hotels free wifi. The hotel seemed understaffed. Tried calling front desk - no answer. No one at concierge twice when we required help. We had 4 people in our room but were only ever given 3 towels..having to request extra each day. A little disappointing from Sheraton.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Grama,

We are very glad that we will be seeing you again. Thanks for the four star rating of your stay here. Please note that all qualifying SPG Guests now get free in room wifi.

We look forward to your next visit. Make it soon!

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText:
All good except:
No free wifi
No good breakfast offerings
But I would book there again anyway.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Lisa,

Thanks for taking the time to share your experience at Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf with us. We are glad that it was a great experience including comfortable accommodations and convenient location.

It was our pleasure to serve you. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Family get away
review.reviewText:
The locale is great. Easy access to most of the city. On site r parking was convenient, but pricey. Older property, but updated.Only Double beds avail, but very comfortable. Very small bath and vanity area, with  limited counter space for your stuff, and no where to hang your towels.
Typical "city" hotel...$50/day parking, $15/day Wi-Fi, $5 lobby coffee.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Sandra,

Thanks for the feedback. Look for our packages in the future that may be a bit more value for you.

Sincerely, Michael Hirsch

review.title: Nice but pricey
review.reviewText: This is a nice place, close to all the tourist venues at Fisherman's Wharf in San Francisco. But by the time you pay the outrageous summer price and then pay for any "extra" things like Wi-Fi, coffee, a fridge or microwave in your room, and $60 each night for parking, it really adds up. We could only get a king bed room, so my 17 y.o. had to sleep on the floor (another outrageous fee for a rollaway). Stay a little bit further out and get some comfort.  City busses are pretty easy to use. Fisherman's Wharf is overrun with tourists and tourist-money-grabbing shops and restaurants, and if I went to San Fran again I'd stay elsewhere.

managementResponses.response: Thanks for the feedback. We will definitely work to provided every Guest the room that works for them.

review.title: only good thing is location
review.reviewText: The best thing about this hotel is the location. The bathrooms are too small. There's not much space for anything because there's no counter, it's pretty much just the sink. Our window was right in front of a bus parking space so needless to say, it was very noise. I know the costs in San Francisco are high but for the price I paid for the hotel, I was expecting a little better room.
